home.hero_title: Outsource B2B/B2C prospecting. Generate more qualified meetings.
home.hero_subtitle: Turnkey solution to scale your sales pipeline without hiring. 15-30 qualified meetings/month via LinkedIn, email and SDR calls. Guaranteed ROI from month 1.
home.step1_desc: We work with you to identify your ideal customer profile and target segments.
home.step2_desc: Our team executes personalized multichannel campaigns across LinkedIn, email, and phone.
home.step3_desc: Receive 15–20 qualified appointments per month, ready for your team to close.
home.proof_line: +10 B2B sectors served • Europe/Canada • Measurable ROI from month 1
home.testimonial1: NLG Consulting transformed our lead generation. We now have a consistent pipeline of qualified meetings.
home.testimonial2: The multichannel approach works. We've seen a 3x increase in qualified opportunities.
home.testimonial3: Professional, data-driven, and results-oriented. Highly recommend for B2B prospecting.

services.title: B2B & B2C Prospecting Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive multichannel lead generation and appointment setting
services.hero_cta: Ready to scale your sales pipeline?
services.linkedin_desc: Personalized connection sequences with safe engagement limits to protect your brand reputation. B2B-focused targeting with decision-maker reach.
services.email_desc: Domain warm-up, deliverability optimization, and nurturing sequences that convert. Perfect for both B2B and B2C campaigns with ROI tracking.
services.calling_desc: Professional qualification and calendar booking with trained SDRs who understand your value proposition. Lead qualification and pipeline delivery.
services.copywriting_desc: Conversion-focused scripts and messaging that resonate with decision-makers. From cold outreach to nurture campaigns.
services.b2b_focus: B2B Focus: multichannel SDR campaigns, sales outsourcing, lead qualification, ROI tracking
services.b2c_focus: B2C Focus: inbound automation, CRM follow-up, appointment setting, retention campaigns
services.how_step1: Discovery Call → We analyze your target market
services.how_step3: Qualified Meetings → You close, we deliver pipeline
services.mid_banner: Trusted by top European teams — let's talk results.
services.faq_q1: How do you ensure lead quality?
services.faq_a1: We use ICP-based targeting, qualification criteria, and real-time feedback loops to continuously improve lead quality.
services.faq_a2: 7-day setup, 2-4 weeks for first qualified meetings, ongoing optimization for maximum ROI.
services.faq_a3: Primarily France, Belgium, Switzerland, and Canada, with EU and North American market expertise.
services.faq_q4: How do you handle data compliance?
services.faq_a4: Full GDPR compliance, minimal data collection, EU-based storage, and transparent data handling practices.

about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: Accelerating B2B & B2C growth without the overhead of hiring
about.bio_intro: NLG Consulting is led by Gregory Brenig, a business development specialist with 15+ years of experience across real estate, tech, and B2B SaaS.
about.bio_experience: With operations based in Europe and Tel Aviv, Gregory has helped founders, agencies, and sales teams across France, Belgium, Switzerland, and Canada scale their revenue without the costs and risks of hiring.
about.bio_approach: His approach combines data-driven targeting, human-first communication, and relentless execution to deliver measurable pipeline growth.
about.mission_text: We help founders, agencies, and sales teams scale faster with data-driven outreach and real human touch. Our goal: deliver qualified meetings that turn into closed deals.
about.value1_text: Clear reporting, honest feedback, and partnership-based relationships.
about.value2_text: We own the results. KPIs are tracked, optimized, and reported weekly.
about.value3_text: No bots, no spam. Every message is crafted to start real conversations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Typically 2–4 weeks for the first qualified meetings.
faq.q2: Do you work with any industry?
faq.a2: Yes—as long as it's consultative B2B sales.
faq.a3: Yes (HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce…). We push leads & meetings with proper statuses.
faq.a4: We do. Conversion-first copywriting, validated with you pre-launch.
faq.a5: Domain warm-up, SPF/DKIM/DMARC, A/B tests, and rate monitoring.
faq.a6: It's not our core, but yes, we can run B2C conversion campaigns.
faq.a7: Minimal data, EU storage, deletion/export on request — GDPR compliant.
faq.a8: You do. We hand over lists, sequences, and playbooks.
faq.a9: Yes, follow-up SDR to qualify and book in your calendar.
faq.q10: How many meetings per month can we expect?
faq.a12: Replies, meeting rate, pipeline, cost/meeting, cycle, no-show rate.
